data.message: THANK YOU for fixing it so I have my video back!!!!  It means so much!  Love Facebook!

replies.message: We're glad you have your video again, Lauren. This is just one small gesture to thank over one billion Facebook users by providing a unique way to look back at some of your biggest moments! -Kristen

i have been trying everyday and i am still getting the 6 photo. i was trying to delete one photo that i didn like in my video and when i went back to have a look, my video disappeared. it really bummed me out. please help me get my video back. :'( :'(
